entry.string: Overview
entry.translation: Oferfeeoo

entry.string: What is it?
entry.translation: Vhet is it?

entry.string: The AddressBook was inspired by the Palm V PDA and gives your site to ability to have a single, shared contact list of multiple private address lists for each registered user.
entry.translation: Zee EddressBuuk ves inspured by zee Pelm F PDA und geefes yuoor seete-a tu ebeelity tu hefe-a a seengle-a, shered cuntect leest ooff moolteeple-a preefete-a eddress leests fur iech regeestered user. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: Xaraya API / BL compliant.
entry.translation: Xereya EPI / BL cumpleeunt.

entry.string: Flexible categories & contact labels
entry.translation: Flexeeble-a cetegureees & cuntect lebels

entry.string: Add custom fields for each entry
entry.translation: Edd coostum feeelds fur iech intry

entry.string: Full text search
entry.translation: Fooll text seerch

entry.string: Image support for each contact
entry.translation: Imege-a sooppurt fur iech cuntect

entry.string: User Features
entry.translation: User Feetoores

entry.string: Each address entry can be categorized
entry.translation: Eech eddress intry cun be-a cetegureezed

entry.string: Up to 5 contact labels per address
entry.translation: Up tu 5 cuntect lebels per eddress

entry.string: Free choice for primary contact (shown in list view)
entry.translation: Free-a chueece-a fur preemery cuntect (shoon in leest feeoo)

entry.string: The list of addresses can be narrowed by selecting an individual category
entry.translation: Zee leest ooff eddresses cun be-a nerrooed by selecteeng un indeefidooel cetegury

entry.string: Address record sorting can be configured multiple ways
entry.translation: Eddress recurd surteeng cun be-a cunffeegoored moolteeple-a veys

entry.string: Unlimited optional fields
entry.translation: Unleemited oopshunel feeelds

entry.string: Custom TEXTAREA field width is configurable
entry.translation: Coostum TEXTEREA feeeld veedt is cunffeegooreble

entry.string: Configurable main menu
entry.translation: Cunffeegooreble-a meeen menoo

entry.string: Free format note field for each contact
entry.translation: Free-a furmet nute-a feeeld fur iech cuntect

entry.string: Auto-fill company address by lookup feature
entry.translation: Ootu-feell cumpuny eddress by luukoop feetoore

entry.string: Copy to clipboard feature (Internet Explorer only / requires Xaraya "sniffer" module to be installed)
entry.translation: Cupy tu cleepbuerd feetoore-a (Internet Ixplurer oonly / reqooures Xereya "sneeffffer" mudoole-a tu be-a instelled)

entry.string: Auto-detect mail and url contact labels
entry.translation: Ootu-detect meeel und url cuntect lebels

entry.string: Global and/or private contacts
entry.translation: Glubel und/oor preefete-a cuntects

entry.string: Show postal code before city (International) option
entry.translation: Shoo pustel cude-a beffure-a ceety (Interneshunel) oopshun

entry.string: Administrator Notes
entry.translation: Edmeenistretur Nutes

entry.string: As an administrator you have access to all records of all users in the Address Book. Therefore the "Show private contacts" switch works different for the administrator than for other users. If it set to "on", all records you have entered are shown, if it is set to "off" all records of all users are shown. A registered user will see only his own records marked as private. So if you want to test the Address Book, create a user account and log in as a normal user.
entry.translation: Es un edmeenistretur yuoo hefe-a eccess tu ell recurds ooff ell users in zee Eddress Buuk. Zeereffure-a zee "Shoo preefete-a cuntects" sveetch vurks deefffferent fur zee edmeenistretur thun fur oozeer users. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Iff it set tu "oon", ell recurds yuoo hefe-a intered ere-a shoon, iff it is set tu "ooffff" ell recurds ooff ell users ere-a shoon. Bork bork bork! A regeestered user veell see-a oonly hees oovn recurds merked es preefete-a. Su iff yuoo vunt tu test zee Eddress Buuk, creete-a a user eccuoont und lug in es a nurmel user. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: As an administrator you will always see the full main menu with all options, regardless of any setting that are made in
entry.translation: Es un edmeenistretur yuoo veell elveys see-a zee fooll meeen menoo veet ell oopshuns, regerdless ooff uny setteeng thet ere-a mede-a in

entry.string: For additional information consult the
entry.translation: Fur eddeeshunel inffurmeshun cunsoolt zee

entry.translation: Inclooded Blucks

entry.string: none right now
entry.translation: nune-a reeght noo

entry.translation: Inclooded Huuks
